---
title: "config.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines contact links for the GitHub repository's issue template. It provides a single link to join the MindsDB community on Slack for general questions and chat.

## Symbols

### `contact_links`
#### Description
This is the main YAML array that contains the contact link information.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The display name for the contact link |
| url | string | The URL of the contact link |
| about | string | A brief description of the contact link's purpose |

#### Internal Logic
The `contact_links` array contains a single item with the following properties:
1. `name`: Set to "Join MindsDB Community"
2. `url`: Set to "https://mindsdb.com/joincommunity"
3. `about`: Provides a brief description of the community and its purpose

## Dependencies
This configuration file relies on GitHub's issue template system to function properly.

## Configuration
The configuration is defined within the YAML structure:
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| contact_links | array | N/A | Contains contact link information |

This configuration file is typically used in conjunction with other issue template files to provide a comprehensive set of options for repository contributors when creating new issues or seeking support.
